subject: Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Ruben Tejada, the Mets’ current and perhaps future shortstop, grew up in a modest home across the street from the small stadium where Los Indios de Veraguas play.
snippet: Ruben Tejada, the Mets’ current and perhaps future shortstop, grew up in a modest home across the street from the small stadium where Los Indios de Veraguas play.
